title: You Say It, I Draw It!
body:
[Update: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/QV2jFpj2-you-said-it-i-drew-it?comment=0002 ] 


Been a couple months since I've done one of these. Going to let this thread simmer for a bit. Post your ideas and check back tomorrow. 

Added one I did in the last thread. I should be doing these on proper paper this time / not using a mechanical pencil and ballpoint.

replies.body: Could you maybe draw Quinn and Valor in some kind of action shot? You can choose the pose. It would be really cool!
http://media.mnn.com/sites/default/files/stephen-colbert-jr.jpg
Added in new thread.
Added in new thread.
What Kirby could look like if he ate various champions (you can pick who you think could work best)! :D
Pool Party Phreak.
OMG I love it.
Realized that was a little hard to read.... Updated.
Thanks! He's at his new home now in the Network Operations Center.
Wait Phreak is now a NOC Technician?
The picture has a new home, not Phreak.
Ah, I get it now, thanks. :)
oh boy, python and linux in the right c:

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=g6kVvcH4,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T02:46:42.910+0000)
>
> OMG I love it.

Of course you do. There's a pun.
Yorick and Taric staring angrily outside the "New Skin Shop" while Zilean and Mordekaiser prance about with their new outfits.
Added in new thread. I took some liberty.

Tabletop Games Syndra

The balls become d20's

Oh my god yes please
This needs to be a skin now
a Halloween skin

(Haiku)
Annie and Jinx dressed up as Splatoon inkling squidgirls shooting each other.
Awkward Garen and Katarina scene?

I've had an idea for a while for a project. League of legends grocery store called Shadow Aisles :DDDD
Kalista: cashier "the contract has been made"
Elise: bagging groceries with all her arms
Thresh: reaching an item down for a customer with his hook
Maokai: working produce with his babies mixed in with the apples
Hecarim: the 25cent pony ride out front
Yorick: raising ghouls to push carts out front

can't think of a really good way of fitting eve, morde, or karth in <.>

> [{quoted}](name=Nyaboron,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=g6kVvcH4,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-05-28T07:08:00.555+0000)
>
> I've had an idea for a while for a project. League of legends grocery store called Shadow Aisles :DDDD
> Kalista: cashier "the contract has been made"
> Elise: bagging groceries with all her arms
> Thresh: reaching an item down for a customer with his hook
> Maokai: working produce with his babies mixed in with the apples
> Hecarim: the 25cent pony ride out front
> Yorick: raising ghouls to push carts out front
> 
> can't think of a really good way of fitting eve, morde, or karth in <.>

Evelynn could be the secret shopper running around the store in stealth to make sure nobody is stealing the product.

Mordekaiser could be running the Deli/Meat department and using his shrapnel shield to cut up the meats for packaging.

Karthus... Now that's the tough one. I was either thinking bakery and him reading instructions from a large baking book and using his Q's to make breads or he could be on the intercom of the store/customer service.

Funny idea though! Lol
I would love to see a picture of {{champion:43}} looking amazed at an electric fan.
It would be cool to see a drawing of Zed, Shen, Akali, and Kennen playing tag :D

Amumu and Annie have a tea party with Tibbers!

Draw it and i'll post a story about it :)
Going to start a new request thread. Normally just pick the top few so check the boards in a few for the new thread.
Fire fighter Singed
I want to see star guardian lux and tuxedo mask ezreal :3 please and thank you <3
All the Voidborn in menacing poses together. Poses that show their ready for any battle.
Popstar Concert w/{{champion:103}} {{champion:99}} and {{champion:134}}
This.

Tabletop Games Syndra

The balls become d20's
I would like to see a High Society Fiora drawing please (Ya know, mink fur coat 20s flapper dress, and a cane with a giant ass diamond on it)

Draw AstroNami (Astronomy)!!!!

The idea is that Nami is star constellation. So she a celestial (or SEAlestial heehehe) being. She would maintain her mermaid body shape and probably have a different head (dorsal?) fin. The coloring would be a deep purple/black mostly, with nice white stars to help out fill in the shape and pronounce her facial features. Her staff would feature a spinning moon on top of it.

Her Q would be like a black hole.

The w would be either a comet with trail or be the colors of the milkyway.

The e would put asteroids around the champion.

The R would be the colors and fluidity of a solar flare (not to be confused with leona.)
Fisherman Fizz catching another Fizz-like thing
A Darkpaper Disciple from Fusion Fall please.
Alzheimerdinger, wandering through the jungle.
PLS {{champion:35}}  x {{champion:222}}  It doesnt have enough pics. Heck eve zac x riven has loads of art. PLS
Blood Lord {{champion:122}}. Would love to see it, if only i can draw very good...

I dont know if this is your style or not, but Id love to see your interpretation of a map of Valoran/ Runterra. I need some new headcanon for what it would look like, since the old map we have is so outdated.
What about Ezreal, Diana, and Nami searching high and low for that darn moonstone?
Gragas and Braum are fishing and drinking, and Nami pops out of the water stuck on the hook. Maybe it should be Fizz and Jax with their fisherman/angler skins though lol
